Title: Notification obligation regarding rectification or erasure of personal data or restriction of processing

Rectification.Description: The controller shall communicate any rectification of personal data.

Erasure.Description: The controller shall communicate any erasure of personal data.

Restriction of Processing.Description: The controller shall communicate any restriction of processing.

Recipients.Description: The communication must be made to each recipient to whom the personal data have been disclosed.

Data Subject Rights.Information Request: The controller shall inform the data subject about those recipients if the data subject requests it.
